Section.Catchline: Districts to constitute representative districts of state.

SectionBody.Text: The districts created by this joint resolution constitute and form the representative districts of the state, and members of the Florida House of Representatives shall be elected in and for these representative districts as provided by law.

Note.Text: Superseded by s. 10.16, created by s. 6, Committee Substitute for Senate Joint Resolution 1176, 2012 Regular Session.
